name: react-snowpack-electron-typescript
author: Dison Tangor <disontangor@gmail.com>
description: Template for Electron, Snowpack, React and Typescript

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run snowpack-render-dev" "npm run snowpack-main-build" "npm run electron-start"
scripts.test: echo "This template does not include a test runner by default." && exit 1
